ygData.subject: Fair warning for anyone in Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: Yuck, last night was terrible. A few friends and I, all around 20, were fighting the yard trash in Mistmoore, mostly enemies around 22-24 or so, nothing we
ygData.messageBody:
Yuck, last night was terrible. A few friends and
I, all around 20, were fighting the yard trash in
Mistmoore, mostly enemies around 22-24 or so, nothing we
couldn't handle. Well there are some higher level people
fighting in the castle itself, and they call a train. So
my party zones and after a few minutes we return.
I'm the last of three people in, and I get charmed by
some mob, forgot what it was. So I'm basically this
thing's pet. Somehow I end up from the courtyard to the
maid room, which is a huge jump in the level of mobs,
around 20 or so. Still charmed, I see a friend of mine,
a 48 rogue, and 3 of his friends fighting 3 mobs.
Well I start attacking them but I'm luckily not
hitting them much because I'm such a low level. They get
down to about 2 mobs or so and, for some reason, I'm
charmed to hit a pet in there. I conned it before I hit
it, it was yellow to me. Anyway, whomever was
controlling me made me hit the pet, and about 10 mobs flooded
the room. I killed everyone in there, including
myself. I felt like caca. But, luckily, those other
people in there forgave me relatively quickly and even
got my corpse to me. Here's a tip for anyone in
Mistmoore - leave the pets alone. Their masters will
annihilate you if you touch them. They're usually non aggro,
and I don't know why I was charmed into hitting it in
the first place.<br><br>Iskandar<br>Half elf warrior
of 21 seasons<br>Prexus
